name: suricata-to-abuseipdb
description: Integration tool that analyzes Suricata logs in real time and reports malicious IP addresses to AbuseIPDB.
author: Sefinek <contact@sefinek.net> (https://sefinek.net)

scripts.pull: git pull && git pull --recurse-submodules && pm2 restart suricata-abuseipdb && pm2 logs suricata-abuseipdb
scripts.up: ncu -u && npm install && npm update && npm audit fix
